text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock .@toryboypierce
Even official stats do not ‘tell’ whole truth!
WHO advice was to find people as quickly
as possible testing positive to reduce the
spread of the virus to control it.
That means looking ONLY at the
numbers of ‘new’ people tested
29 April  =  54,575
? 55% of 100,000
